properties.name: Avli Bar-Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut Contact person: Σταύρος Γιαννούλης Αυλή Μπαρ – Εστιατόριο Π. Ηρειώτη 17 18010 Αίγινα E-mail: avlibookings@yahoo.com Τηλ.: (+30) 22970 26438 Fax: (+30) 22970 23360

properties.name: Beer Academy
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut Pleasantly casual beer restaurant in downtown Piraeus.

properties.name: Buffalo Bill
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut Situated in one of the less noisy streets of Glyfada. Great food, good prices and a pleasant garden make this a great spot for summer nights. Great service too! Lots of other restaurants to choose from, around it. Κύπρου 13, Γλυφάδα 210-8943128

properties.name: De Witte Ballons
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut Small but excellent little beer restaurant near the "Profitis Elias" area in, Piraeus. Their cuisine seems to have improved over the time and the service is always pleasant. The beer list is satisfactory and the atmosphere very homely. It\'s also very close to the "Mikrolimano" area, the center of nightlife for Piraeus. tel. 210 4121717

properties.name: Divers Beer
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut One of the best beer restaurants in Athens. Wide selection of beers, always available. Cosy hall coupled with very friendly service and great rock music playing throughout. Be sure to visit but also be sure to make a rservation during the weekend. Probably the most essential beer restaurant in Athens.

properties.name: East Pearl - Chinese Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut Excellent value for money. Cosy interior and great service too. Ακτή Μουτσοπούλου 44, Πειραιάς 210-4288215

properties.name: Ep'Avli
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut Houses in a pleasant neo-classical building and very close to the center of Athens. Pleasant service, good to great food (depending on the dish) and value-for-money prices. tel. 210-7014836 During the summer, food is served in the terrace of the building.

properties.name: Kiku
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut One of THE very best restaurants in Athens. Very expensive but you get what you pay for. The atmosphere is very modern and Kiku is probably your best bet for Japanese cuisine and sushi in Athens. Well worth trying at least once! tel.: 210-3647033

properties.name: Nice 'n Easy
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut

properties.name: October Fest
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut Nice beer restaurant in central Ag. Paraskevi. Good food and decent beer list, but personnel is not very knowledgeable. Service is average, interior is quite nice with many cozy spots. Don\'t go without reserving first! Αγ. Ιωάννου 82 τηλ: 210 6082999 κιν.: 6974 094 090 e-mail: agiaparaskevi@octoberfest.gr

properties.name: Pisina Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut  Luxuriously laid out, multi-decked cafe bar restaurant, right in the heart of Zeas marina. The best of its kind in Piraeus. Set around a large pool, it\'s a great place to be both in the winter as well as during the summer.

properties.name: Rosebud
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut  Cosy, classy little spot in downtown Athens, Kolwnaki area. Excellent place to enjoy your drink along with great finger food (and more...). Music ranges from rock to jazz and there are also live gigs taking place.

properties.name: Square Sushi
properties.description: Posted by Cookeecut Expensive but very atmospheric sushi restaurant. The quality is above average. Δεινοκράτους 65, Κολωνάκι 210-7255236 / 219
